home.title: Open Source Anxiety Toolkit
home.description: Community-built tools for anxiety relief including breathing techniques, grounding, and muscle relaxation.

breathing.title: 2-Minute Breathing Exercise
breathing.description: Free guided breathing exercise using 4:6 breathing pattern. Activates parasympathetic nervous system to reduce anxiety and stress naturally.

grounding.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding Technique
grounding.description: Free grounding exercise using your 5 senses to calm anxiety and panic. Evidence-based technique for immediate stress relief.

guidedBreathing.title: Guided Breathing Exercise
guidedBreathing.description: Extended guided breathing exercises with gentle guidance. 5-10 minute sessions for deeper relaxation and anxiety management.

progressiveMuscleRelaxation.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
progressiveMuscleRelaxation.description: Free guided muscle relaxation exercise. Release physical tension and anxiety through systematic muscle relaxation techniques.

peacefulVisualization.title: Peaceful Visualization
peacefulVisualization.description: Guided visualization exercises for anxiety relief. Journey to calming places in your mind for stress reduction and relaxation.

thoughtLabeling.title: Thought Labeling
thoughtLabeling.description: Interactive anxiety thought categorization tool. Identify and label anxious thoughts to reduce their emotional impact.

stressReliefBubbles.title: Stress Relief Bubbles - Interactive Game
stressReliefBubbles.description: Interactive bubble popping game for stress relief and anxiety management. Satisfying sensory experience for tension release.

soundTherapy.title: Sound Therapy - Healing Frequencies for Anxiety
soundTherapy.description: Free sound therapy with healing frequencies and binaural beats. Deep relaxation audio for anxiety and stress relief.

stressBall.title: Interactive Stress Ball - Drag & Throw for Anxiety Relief
stressBall.description: Interactive virtual stress ball game. Drag, throw, and bounce for immediate stress relief and anxiety management. Free therapeutic tool.
